00016 
00017 class Boo_Csv {
00018     
00019     protected $csv = false;
00020     protected $rows = array();
00021     
00022     /**
00023      * @brief Default constructor.
00024      * @return void.
00025      */
00026     public function __construct() {}
00027     
00028     public static function getFields($text) {
00029         if (Boo_Validator::isNull($text)) {
00030             trigger_error("Field cannot be null", E_USER_WARNING);
00031             return false;
00032         }
00033         $fields = array(); $inString = false; $tmp = '';
00034         
00035         $j = strlen($text);
00036         for ($k = 0; $k < $j; $k++) {
00037             $char = substr($text, $k, 1);
00038             
00039             switch ($char) {
00040                 
00041                 case ',':
00042                     if (!$inString) {
00043                         // add item to fields
00044                         $fields[] = $tmp;
00045                         // clear temp
00046                         $tmp = '';
00047                     } else {
00048                         // add comma
00049                         $tmp .= $char;
00050                     }
00051                     break;
00052                  
00053                 case '"':
00054                     if ($inString) {
00055                         $nextChar = substr($text, $k + 1, 1);
00056                         
00057                         if ($nextChar == '"') {
00058                             // add quote
00059                             $tmp .= '"';
00060                         }
00061                         
00062                         $inString = false;
00063                     } else {
00064                         $inString = true;
00065                     }
00066                     break;
00067                     
00068                 default:
00069                     $tmp .= $char;
00070             }
00071         }
00072         // last one
00073         $fields[] = $tmp;
00074         
00075         // trim fields
00076         array_trim($fields);
00077         return $fields;
00078     }
00079     
00080     public function getRows() { return $this->rows; }
00081     
00082     public function getRow($index) {
00083         if (array_key_exists($index, $this->rows)) {
00084             return $this->rows[$index];
00085         } else {
00086             return false;
00087         }
00088     }
00089     
00090     public function isEmpty() { return empty($this->rows); }
00091     
00092     public function getCsv() { return $this->csv; }
00093     
00094     public function load($csv) {
00095         if ($csv == '') {
00096             trigger_error('CSV cannot be null', E_USER_WARNING);
00097             return false;
00098         }
00099         
00100         $rows = explode("\n", $csv);
00101         // remove last row if needed
00102         if (isset($rows[count($rows) - 1]) && empty($rows[count($rows) - 1])) {
00103             array_pop($rows);
00104         }
00105         
00106         foreach ($rows as $key=>$value) {
00107             $rows[$key] = self::getFields($value);
00108         }
00109         
00110         $this->csv = $csv;
00111         $this->rows = $rows;
00112         return true;
00113     }
00114     
00115     public function exportRows($rows, $fieldNames = true) {
00116         if (count($rows) == 0) {
00117             trigger_error('Row count cannot be zero', E_USER_WARNING);
00118             return false;
00119         }
00120         $csv = '';
00121         if ($fieldNames) {
00122             // make the first line filed names
00123             // grab them from the first row
00124             $csv .= $this->exportFieldsKey($rows[0]). "\n";
00125         }
00126         
00127         foreach ($rows as $fields) {
00128             $csv .= $this->exportFields($fields) . "\n";
00129         }
00130         
00131         return $csv;
00132     }
00133     
00134     public function htmlTable($rows, $attrs = array()) {
00135         if (count($rows) == 0) {
00136             trigger_error('Row count cannot be zero', E_USER_WARNING);
00137             return false;
00138         }
00139         
00140         $tmp = "<thead>\n<tr>\n";
00141         foreach ($rows[0] as $key => $value){
00142             $tmp .= "<th>{$key}</th>\n";
00143             
00144         }
00145         $tmp .= "</tr>\n</thead>\n<tbody>\n";
00146         foreach ($rows as $fields) {
00147             $tmp .= "<tr>\n";
00148             foreach ($fields as $key => $value) {
00149                 $tmp .= "<td>{$value}</td>\n";
00150             }
00151             $tmp .= "</tr>\n";
00152         }
00153         
00154         $tmp .= "</tbody>\n";
00155         
00156         $table = new Boo_Html_Table;
00157         $table->applyAttrs($attrs);
00158         $table->setContent($tmp);
00159         return $table;
00160     }
00161     
00162     public function exportFields($fields) {
00163         $csv = '';
00164         foreach ($fields as $key => $value) {
00165                 $value = str_replace('"', '""', $value); // escape quotes
00166                 $csv .= "\"{$value}\",";
00167             }
00168             // trim last comma
00169             $csv = Boo_CSV::fixLastComma($csv);
00170             
00171         return $csv;
00172     }
00173     
00174     public function exportFieldsKey($fields) {
00175         $csv = '';
00176         foreach ($fields as $key => $value) {
00177                 $csv .= "\"{$key}\",";
00178             }
00179             // trim last comma
00180             $csv = Boo_CSV::fixLastComma($csv);
00181             
00182         return $csv;
00183     }

00191     public function open($filename) {
00192         
00193     }
00194     
00195     /**
00196      * @brief Strips last comma from a string.
00197      * 
00198      * @param string $string The string to fix.
00199      * @return string The string without the last comma if present.
00200      */
00201     public static function fixLastComma($string) {
00202         $string = rtrim($string, ', ');
00203         return $string;
00204     }
00205 }
